Data , include antifungal treatment , clinical microbiological response antifungal treatment ( 2 , 4 , 12 week diagnosis ) , survival status , collect document fungemia episode* 12 week diagnosis fungemia . NOTE : *That occur within 2-year period . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 300 patient accrue study .
